reviewText: This is a great deal on three really decent movies for the family to enjoy.  Camp Nowhere is funny and entertaining as you'd expect from anything Christopher Lloyd is in.  Baby is not so funny but it's a nice tale of how many humans will try to destroy something they don't understand, but luckily there are humans who don't feel the same and want to preserve this uniqueness.  And My Father the Hero was actually very funny.  Based on how people can get their messages mixed up and the chaos it can cause.
Very fast delivery!  The DVD case had a crack and a very small scratch on one of the DVDs but i only bought it for camp nowhere.  Great price speedy and well worth it!  Will buy from again
LOVE Camp Nowhere and the DVD itself worked awesomely!  I have never heard of the other two movies on the DVD and have yet to watch either of them also.
These movies are family viewing the way they used to be made.  Although not up to todays standards of special effects and lacking a bit they are still quite watchable.
Poor audio quality.
The movies  was okay.
Good deal
My movie shows up with the case broken and the movies rolling everywhere

This a 3 movie set which I purchased to see My Father The Hero with Gerard Depardieu, which is a good film with a warm heart and several very funny scenes in it. This father-daughter story comes to life thanks to Mr. Depardieu's expressive French reactions to everybody and his ability to seriously make fun of his own ego and be funny all at once. The lines are classic and the story isn't always strong but go along for the good stuff and great situation comedy.
The My Father The Hero DVD was scratched. My children couldn't finish watching it.
Quality of movie is well.  Movie case was crushed or broken on the corner of DVD case.  It does not close properly

I watched one of these movies when I was a kid - Baby: Secret of the Lost Legend.  Been trying to find it on DVD so I can enjoy it again.  I've been searching for lots of movies from my childhood, glad I found this one!  I currently don't have kids, but one day I plan on having them and I'll be able to share a piece of my childhood with them when I share my childhood movies with them.

The other 2 movies was just an added bonus.  My father the hero is ok...I never did care for it too much (my sister watched it several times and wore me out with it).  And Camp Nowhere I never heard before, but it too was an ok movie.

When I ordered this DVD I was expecting a triple feature as advertised.  However, when I received it, only Camp Nowhere and Baby: Secret of the Lost legend were on it.  My Father the Hero was not included at all, thus making this product a double feature.
I have wanted the movie Baby for quite some time. I wad sop pleased to see it on dvd, most people I know have never heard of it.
Love these movies! Great combo choice
Awesome!!!
My daughter enjoyed all three movies on this disk. Great product at a great price.
Get this for My Father the Hero and see Katherine Heigl as a little girl in a very funny funny show.  Gerard Depardieu is perfect as a funny straight man.  Dry but perfect humor.
Came as described, and prompt shipping
Good movies.
Awesome!!!!!!
all is great
Great price for three movies!!!!

Saw one of the movies a long time ago.........Guess I've grown up and jaded........lol  It was a disappointment compared to a lot of the dinosaur movies out here today..........Luckily, I didn't pay a lot.............

I had been telling my niece and nephew about Camp Nowhere for years but it was never on tv or available for cheap. I was ecstatic when I found this dvd and my munchkins loved the movie. We haven't watched the other 2 movies, but I wish they were better movies from the era. Maybe Blank Check, Ritchie Rich, Man of the House, Cucamonga, etc....
Love this movie!! I have been surching for it for years. So happy to have found it to share with my kids.
my father the hero had a bad place in the middle of the movie causing it to jump about 10 mi. over part of the movie. the other two movies were ok
Item was excatly as described. Great old school movies from childhood. Great fun for everyone in the family. Just what was looking for.
This purchase brought back childhood memories... good ones. I am very happy I made this purchase. I would recommend this purchase for others.

My girlfriend and her daughter love My Father the Hero so I got this set for them.  Have yet to watch the other movies but I will say, MFtH is actually very enjoyable....and you can't forget Katherine Heigl in a 90's thong (even if it makes you feel creepy watching it as she is only 16)
great movies, watched these myself when i was younger and now my kids are watching them and they love them great service, fast and dvds where like new thank you
This was a gift and it was an awesome buy and it shipped so fantastically fast and it was packed great!!!!

Camp Nowhere funny and probably the best of the three.  My  Father the Hero with a very young Katherine Heigl and always likeable Gerard Depardieu is enjoyable.  Secret of the Lost Legend is not PG, not suitable for anybody under 14 even these days due to lengthy scenes displaying topless native women of all ages, otherwise it is a strictly B science-fictionay flick.  The 4 stars are for the other two movies.
I loved these movies growing up and I really enjoy them to this day. My 3 year old son really likes BABY.
Product is exactly is described.
Amazing movies...
I bought this bundle for the Dinosaur movie and enjoyed it. I like the other movies as well. Camp Nowhere was an amusing romp. The kids liked it. My Father the Hero borders on Creepy.
Great combo
Great!

My Father the Hero was a classic cut movie from the 90's.  Baby was another nice movie.  Only markdown was that Camp Nowhere didn't work at all.  I tried it on several players.  Just didn't want to work.
Upon opening, the DVDs were obviously used (this was NOT noted in the product description). All movies showed scratches, and one is totally unusable.
I love these movies... when I'm looking for a fun nice or something to change my down mood... this is it. Good movies... packaged good... shipped in a timely fashion and arrived unharmed.
Very funny my father the hero such a funny movie loved it... Very satisfied with my purchased.
